# VEHICLE::GET_VEHICLE_MODEL_ACCELERATION_MAX_MODS

## Summary
Get the maximum drive force this vehicles can apply to the ground with mods. This isn't particularly accurate and should be used as a guide and referenced with top speed.

## Parameters
* **MODEL_NAMES** vehicleModelHashKey: VehicleClass - the VEHICLE_CLASS type

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
9.8 * thrust if air vehicle, else 0.38 + drive force?

Full list of vehicles by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/vehicles.json
